msContents.summary: The Pōkar Nikaṇṭu, that is, the "Thesaurus of Pōkar", a Siddha medical work by Pōkar. See Zvelebil (1995, p. 566, s.v. Pōkar). Abbreviated version (curukkam) in the form of a dictionary (akarāti), Tamil-Tamil. Each entry receives a definition, followed by a number between parentheses.

extent.note: The leaves are broader in their middle than at their edges.

61 folios = Text Proper. Arabic foliation 579-639. Old paper.

origin.origDate: Dated to CE 1848 on the title page (U1b, f578r).

acquisition.p: Received, August 1st, 1866, from the Société Asiatique. See BnF, département des Manuscrits, inventaire 7 = Dons: manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1848-1895, no. 1192.

provenance.p: Owned by Édouard Ariel (1818-1854). Bequested by Édouard Ariel to Société Asiatique (Rosny 1868, p. 177), according to Vinson (1866-), but not according to Cabaton (1912). The usual Ariel title page is found.

encodingDesc.p: Transliteration conventions ― Unmarked puḷḷi, ō, and ē restored. Uppercase for initial vowels (in excerpts only). ― Abbreviations ― c = column, f = folio, lf = library foliation = lm = left margin, r = recto, rm = right margin, U = unit (codicological and/or textual), v = verso.
